H0.text: Political leader Mustafa Kemal is better known by what name. Kemal Pasha

H1.text: Political leader Mustafa Kemal is better known by what name. Mustafa Bey

H2.text: Political leader Mustafa Kemal is better known by what name. Ankara

H3.text: Political leader Mustafa Kemal is better known by what name. Ataturk

A4.text: After receiving the surname Atatürk on his first ID card in 1934, his name appeared as Kemal Atatürk, while the given name Mustafa had disappeared altogether.
